name: INGENIOUS ISLAND
description:
INGENIOUS ISLAND is a point and tap tropical island adventure. Easy to play with ingenious puzzles.

DESCRIPTION:

You wake to find yourself on an island
You have no clue why you are there
But you are determined to find a way to get home
Explore your surroundings thoroughly
Interact with objects by tapping on them
Try to find solutions to problems you encounter
Good luck…

CONTROLS:

Point and Tap to explore
Search your surroundings for objects
